name: HOVER (GabrielJoyce)
description:
HOVER is an early prototype of a hoverboard mechanic for a game, I've been working on it solo in UE4 for a little over a week.

INSTRUCTIONS

Perform tricks and land straight to reach high speeds using your hoverboard

CONTROLS - GAMEPAD HIGHLY RECOMMENDED

Left Stick - Movement Input

Right Stick - Tricks and Flips

Left Trigger - Boost

Right Trigger - Crouch and Jump
